title: King's Bounty
description: Branded a war criminal and a traitor by his own people, Pack Loren is the outcast son of a dead world. His resources are low and his allies are few in the chaotic regions of the universe where world powers vie for control of the Known. So when the New Regime posted their bounty the Ex-soldier could not resist. Never mind that who they wanted captured was no one else but the last king of the worlds.
author: Howard Night
